typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		countryname as string,
		countrycode as string,
		date as string,
		c1_school_closing as string,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		c2_workplace_closing as string,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		c3_cancel_public_events as string,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as string,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c5_close_public_transport as string,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as string,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as string,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c8_international_travel_controls as string,
		e1_income_support as string,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as string,
		e3_fiscal_measures as string,
		e4_international_support as string,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as string,
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h2_testing_policy as string,
		h3_contact_tracing as string,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as string,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as string,
		m1_wildcard as string,
		confirmedcases as string,
		confirmeddeaths as string,
		stringencyindex as string,
		stringencyindexfordisplay as string,
		legacystringencyindex as string,
		legacystringencyindexfordisplay as string,
		iso_country as string,
		load_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> cosmosdb
cosmosdb derive(SourceSystem = 'CosmosDB') ~> SourceSystem
SourceSystem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['covid19cosmosdb.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> datalake
